item.title: CVE-2024-33948|2024-05-02T16:47:24.852Z -- Pixel Industry -- TweetScroll Widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pixel Industry TweetScroll Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects TweetScroll Widget: from n/a through 1.3.7.
